L

login(String, String) - Method in class client.control.ClientComControl
Checks the credentials with the data from the server to login the user
login(String, String) - Method in class client.control.MainFrame
Logs the client in with the given credentials
Login - Class in client.view
Provides fields and methods to make a login page
Login(LoginListener) - Constructor for class client.view.Login
Creates a new instance of the class with the given listener
login() - Method in class server.control.DoThings
Authenticates the user and sends the student's transcript if authentication succeeded
login(String, String) - Method in class server.control.ServerDataControl
Authenticates the student's login information and creates a new Student object for the user
LoginListener - Interface in client.view
Provides fields and methods to listen to the login button on the login frame
